name: Sticky Just Ice
description:
Controls: (with a gamepad - supports local multiplayer)
Start - Join in
Select - Drop out
Left Thumbstick - Move
A - Jump
X - Dash
Alt+F4 - RAGEQUIT

Game Design / Programming - Alan Jones 
http://www.schmutza.com

Design / Meshes / Textures / Music - Alex Roberts
http://www.suckerbirdgames.com

This game was created for shenanijam 2018
Topic: Sticky Justice

Achievements: 
Mozart - compose your own music.
Tango - Your team size is 2.
